PHRASE.LANG: Best to be careful making sudden moves around your new pet goat, because it faints easily! This new pet will follow you around and become your virtual companion. [#Legal]
Évitez les mouvements brusques quand cette chèvre est dans les parages car elle s'évanouit facilement ! Cet adorable compagnon vous suivra partout et deviendra votre meilleur ami. [#Legal]
In der Nähe dieser zahmen Ziege sollte man besser keine plötzlichen Bewegungen machen, denn sie fällt leicht in Ohnmacht! Dieses neue Haustier wird zum treuen virtuellen Begleiter. [#Legal]
Evita di fare movimenti bruschi nelle vicinanze del tuo nuovo cucciolo di capra, perché sviene facilmente! Questo nuovo cucciolo ti seguirà e diventerà il tuo compagno virtuale. [#Legal]
Será mejor que no hagas movimientos bruscos, porque esta cabra se desmaya con facilidad. Esta nueva mascota te seguirá y se convertirá en tu compañera virtual. [#Legal]
쉽게 기절하는 이 애완 염소 옆에서는 조심해서 움직여야 합니다. 이 새로운 애완동물은 당신을 따라다니며 즐거운 시간을 함께할 것입니다. [#Legal]
Best to be careful making sudden moves around your new pet goat, because it faints easily! This new pet will follow you around and become your virtual companion. [#Legal]
在你的新山羊隨身夥伴附近突然移動時最好小心，因為牠很容易會暈倒！這隻新寵物會一直尾隨你，成為你的虛擬夥伴。 [#Legal]
在你的新山羊隨身夥伴附近突然移動時最好小心，因為牠很容易會暈倒！這隻新寵物會一直尾隨你，成為你的虛擬夥伴。 [#Legal]
Best to be careful making sudden moves around your new pet goat, because it faints easily! This new pet will follow you around and become your virtual companion. [#Legal]
